title: Position vertex attribute
description: Relative the center of oriented-bounded box of the node

type.description: Vertex positions relative to Oriented-bounding-box center

component.description: Number of coordinates per vertex position. Must be 2 or 3. If 2, then `z=0.0`

enum-description.fixed-point: **For integer format ONLY**. `scale` and `offset` will be applied: `XYZ_float= (float)XYZ_int * scale + offset`

scale.description: scale to be applied to **integer** type only (`encoding='fixed_point'`). ignored otherwise. `default=1`

offset.description: offset to be applied to **integer** type only (`encoding='fixed_point'`). ignored otherwise. `default=0`

examples.title: 16-bit per coordinate XYZ. [0,65k] coordinates will be multiply by 0.0001 and shift by 14.2
{x,y} position as float32, z will be set to 0
